Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities that lead to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all review process activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in the most common variant paths
Number of times 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' is followed by 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities that are not followed by 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' leading to a decision ('SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Major Revision', 'SW-EIC Minor Revision', 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit', 'SW-EIC Reject')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' followed by 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' per manuscript case
Metric: Frequency of activity '{}' grouped by the last value of code

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in manuscripts that require major revision ('SW-EIC Major Revision') compared to those that are accepted ('SW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' that precede any form of manuscript submission confirmation ('Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation', 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities that occur before 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in relation to the total number of activities before reaching 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' in manuscripts that exceed the Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' followed by 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'
